section.title: Aten
section.para: The 'master' class type, 'aten', is there to provide access to various other structures such as the list of loaded models, preferences, element data etc. It is available at all times from any command, script, or filter, and is always called 'aten'.

row.entry: Array of element data (masses, symbols, names, etc.)
